content: I can hardly believe the Summer Festival is almost here. {A不好意思}I've got my summer dress, sandals, and paper fan all ready. How about we catch goldfish and watch the fireworks together?
info: 日常对话-日常闲聊-特殊节日-夏日祭即将到来-1005幻雪_单一闲聊

content: The legendary Summer Festival is about to begin. You'll be going, right? {A拍手}When the time comes, make sure to find me under the light of the fireworks.
info: 日常对话-日常闲聊-特殊节日-夏日祭即将到来-1005幻雪_单一闲聊
